description.@en: With a clap of thunder, a bolt of lightning arcs to strike your foe!

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, your foe suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are knocked Prone. Your foe can successfully Resist with a Coordination Test.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe cannot Resist this Magick.

criticalFailure.@en: The bolt arcs upwards into the air, reflecting off the nearest surface and directly back at you! In a flash of lightning, you are knocked off your feet, your hair stood straight on end. You suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage and are knocked Prone.

reagents.@en: A vial of rain water, poured into hand and clapped together (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
